market-products.label: Market Products
market-products.description: Show All The Products Of The Market

store-products.label: Store Products
store-products.description: Show All The Products Of The Store

total-locker-cashes.label: Total Locker Cashes
total-locker-cashes.description: Show The Current Total Cashes Of The Locker

transfer.label: Transfer Between Market & Store
transfer.description: Transfer Products From The Market To The Store, And From The Store To The Market

client-bills.label: Client Bills
client-bills.description: Show All The Client Bills, With The Ability To Open The Bill Details

supplier-bills.label: Supplier Bills
supplier-bills.description: Show All The Supplier Bills, With The Ability To Open The Bill Details

quick-client-statement.label: Quick Client Statement
quick-client-statement.description: Create A Quick Client Statement With Cash, OR Visa Process

supplier-statement.label: Supplier Statement
supplier-statement.description: Create A New Supplier Statement With Milestone OR Paid All Methods, And Cash, OR Visa Process

locker-withdraw-and-deposit.label: Locker Withdraw & Deposit
locker-withdraw-and-deposit.description: Withdraw OR Deposit Any Amount From / To The Locker

today-purchase-receipt.label: Today Purchase Receipt
today-purchase-receipt.description: Show All The Purchase Products Of The Current Day

today-sales-receipt.label: Today Sales Receipt
today-sales-receipt.description: Show All The Sales Products Of The Current Day

total-market-and-store-cashes.label: Total Market & Store Cashes
total-market-and-store-cashes.description: Show All The Total Cashes Of Market, And Store By Sold, And Purchase Prices

total-debt-cashes.label: Total Debt Cashes
total-debt-cashes.description: Show All The Total Debt Cashes Of The Clients OR Suppliers

locker-transactions.label: Locker Transactions
locker-transactions.description: Show All The Transactions Done On The System Similar To Client Statement, Supplier Statement, Canceled Bill, And Bill Payments

supplier-details.label: Supplier Details
supplier-details.description: Show All The Supplier Pending Costs, Phone Numbers, And Supplier Products

client-details.label: Client Details
client-details.description: Show All The Clients Pending Costs, Purchase Costs, Phone Number, Discounts, And Level

active-client-layers.label: Active Client Layers
active-client-layers.description: The Client Level Navigate Between Bronze, Silver, And Gold Layer

advanced-client-statement.label: Advanced Client Statement
advanced-client-statement.description: Create A New Client Statement With All The Details Of Client Name, Method (Cash - Process), Process (Pay All - Milestone), And The Discount On The Bill

product-sales-and-profits.label: Product Sales And Profits
product-sales-and-profits.description: Show The Sales And Profits Movement Statement For The Products

sales-statistics.label: Sales Statistics
sales-statistics.description: Show The Products Sales Of For Each Day In The Month, And Each Month Of The Year

profits-statistics.label: Profits Statistics
profits-statistics.description: Show The Products Profits Of For Each Day In The Month, And Each Month Of The Year

insufficient-products.label: Insufficient Products
insufficient-products.description: Show The Insufficient Products By Choosen Supplier Name

best-selling-of-the-month.label: Best Selling Of The Month
best-selling-of-the-month.description: Show The Best Selling Products In The Month

best-selling-of-the-year.label: Best Selling Of The Year
best-selling-of-the-year.description: Show The Best Selling Products In The Year
